name: XonXRP
description: The X project on the XRPL is building tools to improve security and provides analytics to help improve the user experience and ensure a safe and secure platform. The two websites Xledgerxrp.com and Xtracer.com are a few of the suite of tools offered. At the heart of innovation, trust, and freedom, $X is more than what meets the eye. Rooted in the transparent power of the XRP Ledger (XRPL), it stands as a symbol of decentralization and limitless potential. X envisions a future where collaboration and innovation thrive, driven by a new definition of what "X" can be. Embracing the spirit of mystery and belief, X invites you to be part of a story for those who trust in the transformative power of connection.
